story.title: Cricket Chronicles: The Strategy Showdown
story.narrative: In the vibrant world of cricket, young captain Arjun is on a quest to lead his team to victory in the national tournament. Facing seasoned rivals, Arjun must use strategic placements and deep understanding of cricket dynamics to outmaneuver the opponents.
story.background: Set in bustling stadiums across India, each venue offers unique challenges and opportunities. From the iconic Eden Gardens to the scenic Dharamsala ground, players navigate through real-life cricket scenarios.
story.learning_goal: Develop strategic thinking and understanding of cricket field positions and play strategies.
story.challenge_description: Students must strategically place fielders on a cricket ground to counter different batting styles, understanding field positions and strategies.

html_structure.layout: Grid layout with header for game title, main arena visualization in center, sidebar for instructions and feedback, footer with navigation buttons.
html_structure.responsive_design: Uses CSS media queries to adapt the grid layout for mobile/tablet/desktop; collapsible sidebar on smaller screens.

javascript_functionality.game_state: Managed with objects tracking player positions, current challenge, and score; arrays for randomized scenarios
javascript_functionality.randomization: Different batting styles and ground layouts per student to ensure unique strategies
javascript_functionality.feedback_system: Visual feedback with animations and color changes; audio cues for correct placements
javascript_functionality.scoring: Based on accuracy and efficiency of fielder placement; displayed in scoreboard

anti_cheating_measures: Unique field scenarios per student with randomized elements
Interactive placement that requires understanding positions
Timers for decision-making steps to add pressure
Mandatory interaction with visuals to solve challenges

components.name: Game Arena
components.description: Visual representation of the cricket field where players are placed
components.implementation: HTML canvas or SVG with interactive drag-and-drop capabilities

components.name: Strategy Selector
components.implementation: HTML buttons with JavaScript event listeners

steps.description: Introduction and overview of cricket strategy
Placement of fielders according to given scenario
steps.user_action: Drag and drop fielders to positions on screen
Click to confirm and see strategy in action
steps.visual_feedback: Animation of game scenario playing out

gameplay_flow.challenge_question: Why is a specific field placement optimal for a certain batting style?

answer_validation.correct_criteria: Fielders placed in positions that maximize the chance of catching or stopping run
answer_validation.partial_credit: Partial credit for nearly optimal placements
